analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/22/0xc6270e8d03760e996107ac9cb989a57857ec818e.sol:
	Contract IVNT4Token has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/22/0xc6270e8d03760e996107ac9cb989a57857ec818e.sol#221)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_chucks/22/0xc6270e8d03760e996107ac9cb989a57857ec818e.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/22/0xc6270e8d03760e996107ac9cb989a57857ec818e.sol#79-80) is not in mixedCase
